entry.title: Small update to BIP 62
entry.summary: In a conversation between Pieter Wuille and an unknown individual, Wuille suggests investigating how many non-DER signatures make it into blocks. He follows up by stating that in the last 11 blocks, which consisted of 4148 transactions, none were found to be non-DER signatures. Furthermore, in the last 389 blocks, consisting of 159466 transactions, none were found to be non-DER signatures.
